content: Loans CPF Asked by AnonymousAsked on 25 May 2018I have a bank loan of around $3k which I took during my time in Poly. Am I able to use my CPF to finance the loan? I have around $12k in CPF. ?2 answersAnswerBump0
Answers (2)Sort By Most UpvoteMost UpvoteMost Recent

GTGabriel Tan Jun WeiLevel 3. WonderkidAnswered on 25 May 2018Hi there,​The above situation would not be possible. However, if you have the means, please clear your debt asap.​Meanwhile the amount in your CPF (if the above is the amount in OA) can be used for your future BTO.​0 comments0

Gabriel ThamLevel 8. WizardAnswered on 25 May 2018Unfortunately, that is not possible.​CPF can only be used for housing and property, investments, education, or insurance.​Withdrawal of CPF for personal use can only be done once you reach the CPF withdrawal age and fulfil the minimum sum.​0 comments0
